name: Displaced Persons [Shaded Map]
description: Shaded map indicating total number of displaced persons (IDP + Refugee) in each first level administrative unit

name: Displaced Persons [Bubble Map]
description: Proportional circles indicating total number of displaced persons (IDP + Refugee) in each first level administrative unit

name: Baseline Population, 2016 Estimate [Shaded Map]
description: Current population estmations from a variety of sources

name: Conflict Events [Location Map]
description: Points representing the location of individual conflict events

name: Fatalities from Conflict Events [Bubble Map]
description: Proportional circles indicating total number of fatalities in conflict incidents in each first level administrative unit

name: Funding Progress on Latest Appeal [Chart only]
description: Percentage of current requirements that have been met
